headline: How Recent Developments Are Rewriting the Story for AES
summary: The fair value estimate for AES stock has climbed slightly from $14.13 to $14.46 per share, reflecting recent updates to analyst outlooks despite notable shifts in growth projections. This modest increase follows evolving sentiment in the utilities sector. Bullish analysts are particularly optimistic about AES's market position and potential growth opportunities driven by demand for data centers and improved project execution. Stay tuned to discover how investors can track these shifting...

headline: Morgan Stanley Raises AES Corp. (AES) PT to $24, Cites Utility Focus on Data Center Pipeline
summary: The AES Corporation (NYSE:AES) is one of the best large cap stocks to buy under $20. On October 22, Morgan Stanley analyst David Arcaro raised the price target on AES Corp. to $24 from $23, while keeping an Overweight rating on the shares. This decision was announced as the firm updated its price targets for […]
